title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama CLI and server that lets you run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally with a single command.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; chat, generate, pull, push, and manage models from Node or the browser.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; simple API to chat, generate embeddings, list models, and more.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama; use any Ollama model as an LLM or chat backend in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama; manage models, multi-user chats, markdown, code highlighting.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; fluent builder API, streaming, embeddings, and model management.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for Ollama; simple interface to chat, generate, and pull models from Ruby apps.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced interactive CLI for Ollama with history, syntax highlighting, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that uses Ollama models for inline code suggestions and chat inside the editor.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack NLP pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes for deploying, fine-tuning, and integrating Ollama with cloud, edge, and mobile stacks.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Production-ready Docker Compose stacks for Ollama with GPU support, WebUI, and monitoring.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-ex
summary: Elixir wrapper for Ollama; GenServer-based client with streaming and supervision tree support.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate for Ollama; strongly-typed async client with serde models and tokio streams.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, and list models from C# with async enumerable streams.

title: ollama-modelfile-hub
summary: Community-curated collection of Modelfiles for running fine-tuned, quantized, and custom LLMs with Ollama.

title: ollama-gpt4all
summary: Bridge to import GPT4All models into Ollama format; automatically converts and caches GGUF files.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings Ollama models into any server with slash commands and threads.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that integrates Ollama models as slash commands and DM assistants.
